skills: Yes, Madam: Hong Kong Film Award for Best new Performer (Nominated)
Tomorrow Never Dies: MTV Movie Award for Best Fight (Nominated)
The Soong Sisters: Hong Kong Film Award for Best Supporting Actress (Nominated)
Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon: Toronto Film Critics Association Award for Best Actress (Runner-Up)
Star Trek Discovery: Saturn Award for Best Supporting Actress on Television (Nominated)
Crazy Rich Asians: National Board of Review Award for Best Cast (Won), The Asian Awards for Outstanding Achievement in Cinema (Won)
Everything Everywhere All At Once: Hollywood Critics Association Midseason Film Award for Best Actress (Won)
